trans-unit.source: Customizes rendering for the Web control to which the control adapter is attached, to modify the default markup or behavior for specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: Personaliza la representación del control Web al que está asociado el adaptador de control, para modificar el marcado o el comportamiento predeterminado para exploradores concretos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is the base class from which Web controls inherit.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> clase es la clase base desde la que heredan los controles Web.

trans-unit.source: It defines many properties common to all Web controls.
trans-unit.target: Define muchas propiedades comunes a todos los controles Web.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is a component that substitutes certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class or inherited methods and events in its execution life cycle to allow browser- or markup-specific handling.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> objeto es un componente que sustituye determinados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> clases o métodos heredados y los eventos de su ciclo de vida de ejecución para permitir que un control específico del explorador o del marcado.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework maps a single control adapter to a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object for each client request.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework asigna un adaptador de control único para un derivado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> objeto para cada solicitud de cliente.

trans-unit.source: An adapter modifies a control behavior for a specific browser or class of browsers or acts as an arbitrary filter on some capability.
trans-unit.target: Un adaptador modifica el comportamiento de un control para un explorador específico o una clase de exploradores o actúa como filtro arbitrario en alguna función.

trans-unit.source: Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Gran parte de la adaptabilidad del comportamiento de representación se puede encapsular en las clases especializadas que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> classes might make the use of a control adapter unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, es probable que un único adaptador puede utilizarse para un número de comportamientos de clase de explorador o que inclusión de la adaptabilidad en el <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> clases podrían hacer que el uso de un adaptador de control innecesario.

trans-unit.source: Controls themselves do not necessarily require an adapter.
trans-unit.target: Controles por sí mismos no requieren necesariamente un adaptador.

trans-unit.source: If controls are extended through composition, generally the adapters for the child controls are sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Si los controles se extienden a través de composición, generalmente son suficientes los adaptadores para los controles secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files.
trans-unit.target: Cada control tiene asignaciones explícitas a adaptadores a través de los archivos de definición de Browser.

trans-unit.source: Thus, any access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, cualquier acceso a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> utiliza la <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> objeto extraído de los archivos de definición de Browser para realizar la búsqueda para la asignación del adaptador al control.

trans-unit.source: During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the overridable methods of a control that could be target-specific.
trans-unit.target: Durante el procesamiento, .NET Framework intercepta las llamadas a los métodos reemplazables de un control que podría ser específico del destino.

trans-unit.source: If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods.
trans-unit.target: Si se adjunta un adaptador de control, .NET Framework llama a los métodos de adaptador asociado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The rendering for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> typically consists of a beginning and ending tag, and some inner markup between the beginning and ending tags.
trans-unit.target: La representación de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> normalmente consta de un principio y etiqueta de cierre y algún marcado interno entre las etiquetas.

trans-unit.source: The tags are defined when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> is created.
trans-unit.target: Las etiquetas se definen cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> se crea.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The tags are generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Las etiquetas son generadas por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> métodos, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The inner markup is generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se genera el marcado interno por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> method generates all markup, by calling methods in the following order:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> método genera todo el marcado, mediante una llamada a métodos en el orden siguiente:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A> property returns `true` only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> and all its parent controls are enabled.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A> propiedad devuelve `true` solo si el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> y todos sus controles primarios están habilitados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A> property returns a strongly typed reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A> propiedad devuelve una referencia fuertemente tipada a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> class when it creates the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework crea internamente una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> clase cuando se crea el correspondiente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the Web control to which this control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una referencia al control Web al que está asociado este adaptador de control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> to which this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter" /> is attached.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> a la que está asociado el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object, the .NET Framework calls on the adapter life-cycle methods instead of the control methods.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> objeto está asociado a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> de objeto, llama a .NET Framework en los métodos del ciclo de vida de adaptador en lugar de los métodos de control.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter" /> class, at a minimum, you should implement a <see langword="Control" /> property to return a strongly-typed instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Al heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter" /> (clase), como mínimo, debe implementar un <see langword="Control" /> propiedad para devolver una instancia del control fuertemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Web control and all its parent controls are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si están habilitados el control Web y todos sus controles principales.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> and all its parent controls are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si están habilitados el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> asociado y todos sus controles principales; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A> property provides access for the adapter and any of its derived classes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A> propiedad proporciona acceso para el adaptador y cualquiera de sus clases derivadas para la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> scans the hierarchy of parent controls and returns `true` only if the Web control and all its parents are enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> examina la jerarquía de controles primarios y devuelve `true` solo si se habilitan el control Web y todos sus elementos primarios.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contiene los métodos para representar el resultado específico del destino.

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Genera el marcado específico del destino para el control al que está asociado el adaptador de control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> method generates target-specific markup to send to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> método genera marcado específico del destino que se envía al explorador del cliente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> is called in place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> se llama en lugar de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método si un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> objeto está asociado a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base method calls <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />, then <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />, and then <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base llamadas al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />, a continuación, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />y, a continuación, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> and do not call the base method, you must be sure to provide this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Si invalida <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> y no se llama al método base, debe ser seguro proporcionar esta funcionalidad.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contiene los métodos para representar el resultado específico del destino.

trans-unit.source: Creates the beginning tag for the Web control in the markup that is transmitted to the target browser.
trans-unit.target: Crea la etiqueta de principio para el control Web en el marcado transmitido al explorador de destino.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method to write additional markup tags or add attributes to the beginning tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> método para escribir etiquetas de formato adicionales o agregar atributos a la etiqueta de inicio para la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method to assure beginning and ending tag consistency.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> junto con el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> método para asegurarse de apertura y cierre la coherencia entre las etiquetas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base method calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base llamadas al método el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base method calls the appropriate <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" /> overload, which is determined by the type of tag with which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> object was created.
trans-unit.target: A su vez, el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> método base llama a la correspondiente <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" /> sobrecarga, que viene determinado por el tipo de etiqueta con la que el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> se creó el objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can avoid overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> by deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> class and overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" />, and also possibly <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag" />.
trans-unit.target: Puede evitar el reemplazo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> derivando de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> clase e invalidar <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" />y posiblemente también <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contiene los métodos para representar el resultado específico del destino.

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific inner markup for the Web control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Genera el marcado interno específico del destino para el control Web al que está asociado el adaptador de control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method generates the inner markup, between the beginning and ending tags for the control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> método genera el marcado interno, entre el comienzo y finalización de etiquetas para el control.

trans-unit.source: Typically, markup is generated by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>, which calls methods in the following order:
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, genera marcado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>, que llama a métodos en el orden siguiente:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> to generate target-specific inner markup to send to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> para generar el marcado interno específico del destino para enviar al explorador del cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> base method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> base llamadas al método <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which in turn calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base llamadas al método <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, que a su vez, llama <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Thus, overrides of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> should call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, se invalida de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> debería llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> base método únicamente si su procesamiento es además, en lugar de en lugar de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: For a composite control, you must ensure that the child controls are rendered.
trans-unit.target: Para un control compuesto, debe asegurarse de que se representan los controles secundarios.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method and do not call its base method, you can cause the child controls to be rendered by calling <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter.RenderChildren(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> which, if not overridden, calls <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> from the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Si invalida el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> método y no llame a su método base, puede hacer que el elemento secundario que se procesen mediante una llamada a los controles <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter.RenderChildren(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> que, si no se reemplaza, llama <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> desde el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> invalidar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contiene los métodos para representar el resultado específico del destino.

trans-unit.source: Creates the ending tag for the Web control in the markup that is transmitted to the target browser.
trans-unit.target: Crea la etiqueta de cierre del control Web en el marcado transmitido al explorador de destino.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method to write additional markup tags or add attributes to the ending tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> método para escribir etiquetas de formato adicionales o agregar atributos a la etiqueta de cierre para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method to assure beginning and ending tag consistency.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> junto con el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> método para asegurarse de apertura y cierre la coherencia entre las etiquetas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base method calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base llamadas al método el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base method calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: A su vez, el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> base llamadas al método el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: You can avoid overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> by deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> class and overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag" />, and also possibly <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" />.
trans-unit.target: Puede evitar el reemplazo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> derivando de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> clase e invalidar <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag" />y posiblemente también <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag)" />.
